Desc.entry: An interactive experience offered to all Y6 pupils in South Yorkshire. Held at the purpose built Lifewise Centre in Rotherham, it gives children the opportunity to get involved in different scenarios such as road safety, fire safety, anti-social behaviour, drugs and alcohol, first aid, running away from home and a Magistrates court. Crucial Crew is a partnership project between South Yorkshire Police and South Yorkshire Fire and Rescue Service. Other partners and voluntary agencies contribute to the project.
